name: One Punch Man - Relics of Avabur
description: A simple theme for the browser-based game, Relics of Avabur. You must have the Classic theme selected in Account Management in order to use this theme.
additional_info: Credit to Reltorakii (edvordo) for his Relics of Avabur - Rewamped themes. If it were not for his code, I wouldn't have been able to figure out how to do this. Made for KaiserKrusel.
